options.B: Body remains tied to the world
options.C: Individual soul remains tied to the Supreme Soul
options.D: Saguna Ishvara remains tied to Nirguna Ishvara

vikalpa.B: शरीर का जगत से बंधे रहना
vikalpa.C: जीवात्मा का परमात्मा से बंधे रहना

options.B: Because of considering the world as full of suffering
options.C: Because of the concept of liberation
options.D: Because of the importance of Law of Karma

2026.prashna: भारतीय दर्शन की आस्तिक शाखाओं में कौन–कौन से दर्शन आते हैं ?

options.C: Sankhya, Yoga, Nyaya, Vaishashika, Mimansa, Vedanta

vikalpa.C: सांख्य, योग, न्याय, वैशेषिक, मीमांसा, वेदान्त

2026.chapter_name: Nature and Schools of Indian Philosophy
2026.question: Which of the following pramanas does charvaka refute?
2026.prashna: चार्वाक इनमें से किस प्रमाण का खण्डन करता है ?

2026.chapter_name: Nature and Schools of Indian Philosophy
2026.question: According to charvaka the world was created :-
2026.prashna: चार्वाक के अनुसार विश्व का निर्माण हुआ है

options.A: By the combination of the four elements
options.B: By the combination of the three elements
options.C: By the combination of the two elements
options.D: By the combination of the five great elements

2026.chapter_name: Nature and Schools of Indian Philosophy
2026.question: According to charvaka, how many purusharthas are there ?
2026.prashna: चार्वाक के अनुसार पुरुषार्थ कितने हैं ?

2026.chapter_name: Nature and Schools of Indian Philosophy
2026.question: According to charvaka the world is :

2026.chapter_name: Nature and Schools of Indian Philosophy
2026.question: Which one of the following pairs is accepted by charvaka ?
2026.prashna: निम्नलिखित में से कौन सा एक युग्म चार्वाक स्वीकार करता है ?

2026.chapter_name: Nature and Schools of Indian Philosophy
2026.question: What is the nature of Indian philosophy?
2026.prashna: भारतीय दर्शन का स्वरूप क्या है ?

2026.chapter_name: Nature and Schools of Indian Philosophy
2026.question: What is notion of Rta in Rigveda? Explain.
2026.prashna: ऋग्वेद में प्रतिपादित ऋत क्या है ? समझाइए।

2026.chapter_name: Nature and Schools of Indian Philosophy
2026.question: Discuss the theory of karma in Indian philosophy.
2026.prashna: भारतीय दर्शन में कर्म सिद्धान्त की विवेचना कीजिए।

2026.chapter_name: Nature and Schools of Indian Philosophy
2026.question: Explain Moksha as a purushartha.
2026.prashna: पुरूषार्थ के रूप में मोक्ष की व्याख्या कीजिए।

2026.chapter_name: Nature and Schools of Indian Philosophy
2026.question: What is the meaning of ‘Darshan’ in the term Bhartiya Darshan?
2026.prashna: भारतीय दर्शन शब्द में ‘दर्शन’ का क्या अर्थ है ?

2026.chapter_name: Nature and Schools of Indian Philosophy
2026.question: What do you mean by the nature of Indian philosophy? Explain.
2026.prashna: भारतीय दर्शन के स्वरूप से आपका क्या तात्पर्य है ? स्पष्ट कीजिए।
